name: 陳靜儀
objective:
AI is redefining designer work in the evolving design field. It is emerging as both a tool and collaborator, enhancing design with its adaptability. The rise of AI in design highlights the importance of prompt engineering. This course explores cutting-edge generative AI tools for prompt engineering and trains ChatGPT with personal data. It aims to teach students how to use ChatGPT as a learning coach and adapt to new tech trends. Additionally, it includes discussions on AI's ethical considerations, copyright, and privacy.
 
Students will learn to use the latest generative AI tools and engage in prompt engineering to aid the design process, conduct research, and analyze data. They will utilize the OpenAI API Playground to build simple applications and create marketing content, digital avatars, and videos. Additionally, they will discuss ethical issues, copyright, privacy, and the future impact of artificial intelligence.

在不斷變化的設計領域，人工智慧 (AI) 正在改變設計師的工作方式。這種轉變不僅將人工智慧視為一種工具，而且將其視為協作夥伴，透過智慧和適應性重塑設計流程。隨著人工智慧在設計中的作用不斷擴大，一項關鍵技能出現了 -- 提示工程 prompt engineering。課程中將介紹生成式 AI 的最新版本工具進行提示；並且學習如何用自己的資料訓練 ChatGPT。除此之外，更指導學生如何讓 ChatGPT 成為自己的學習教練，在未來不斷變化的科技趨勢中不斷成長；並讓學生參與人工智慧倫理議題、版權和隱私的對話討論。

學生將學習：
1. 使用當前最新版本的生成式 AI 工具與提示工程
2. 使用生成式 AI 輔助設計流程
3. 使用生成式 AI 進行研究與資料分析
4. 使用 OpenAI API Playground 與建立簡單的應用程式
5. 使用生成式 AI 創作作品行銷影音與數位分身
6. 使用人工智慧的倫理議題、版權、隱私和未來影響
schedule:
Part 1: Theoretical Knowledge (Weeks 1-6)

Weeks 1-2: Introduction to Generative AI
-Introduction to basic concepts and history of generative AI
-Main technologies and tools
-Intellectual property and ethical considerations

Weeks 3-4: Basics of Prompt Engineering
-Principles of Prompt Engineering
-How to write effective prompts
-Examples of prompt engineering applications

Weeks 5-6: Applications of Generative AI in Design
-Case studies of generative AI in graphic design, industrial design, and other fields
-Selection and use of generative AI tools

Part 2: Practical Exercises (Weeks 7-12)

Weeks 7-8: Prompt Design and Optimization

-Practical exercises: designing prompts and optimizing results
-Peer evaluation and feedback

Weeks 9-10: Project 1 - Graphic Design
-Form teams to complete a graphic design project using generative AI
-Mid-term presentations and feedback

Weeks 11-12: Project 2 - Industrial/Interior Design
Continue project work, focusing on industrial and interior design
Final presentations and evaluations

Weeks 13-14: Project 3 - User Experience Design
-Compile project outcomes
-Prepare presentation materials

Part 3: Project Presentation and Reflection (Weeks 15-18)
-Weeks 15-16: Guest Lectures by Industry Experts
-Weeks 17-18: Course Summary and Reflection
